title: Capital goods excise tax credit
context: ยง241-4.5 Capital goods excise tax credit. The capital goods excise tax credit provided under section 235-110.7 shall be operative for this chapter after December 31, 1987; provided that the capital goods excise tax credit shall be inoperative after December 31, 2008, and before January 1, 2010. [L 1987, c 239, ยง8; am L 2009, c 178, ยง5] Note The 2009 amendment applies to investments made, renovation costs incurred, or eligible depreciable tangible property placed in service on or after May 1, 2009. L 2009, c 178, ยง10.
